name: The First Step (The Wizard And The Frog)
name_original: The First Step (The Wizard And The Frog)
description:
*NOTE: You can remove the developer log in fullscreen*

My very first unity game. It's very short and buggy. Collect coins and win. Ta-da

A - D = Movement

Space = Jump

This is proof to myself that I can make a video game.
